definitions.definition: To beat ; strike with force ; to ram ; to pound , as in a mortar ; reduce to powder , to pulverize .
To make or tell a pun; to make a play on words .
examples: We punned about the topic until all around us groaned.

main_definition: ( transitive , obsolete ) To beat ; strike with force ; to ram ; to pound , as in a mortar ; reduce to powder , to pulverize .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To make or tell a pun; to make a play on words .
